text: Splendour In The Grass is an annual music festival. It is held in July at North Byron Parklands at Yelgun (30 km from Byron Bay), New South Wales, Australia. The festival started in 2001 as a one-day event. It became a two- day event in 2002. In 2012, over 20,000 people attended the festival. == References == Category:Music festivals Category:New South Wales Category:Australian music Category:2001 establishments in Australia
title: Splendour in the Grass
